This is a duplicate. One solution would be new support from JCORE that provided 
element deltas while the resource tree is not locked :-)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 24903 ***

This is unlikely to occur until we get a mechanism from platform/core so as to 
avoid processing the same delta more than once (if listening for deltas at 
different stages). Currently all rsc delta processing is done once we have them 
all - post-change.

If we did update and process the model each time we listen to deltas to notify 
our clients, we would likely do the same amount of work 4 times, since there is 
no way to distinguish whether we did react already to a delta (i.e. is it the 
same delta, or did the resource change again since then?).

Unlikely that we would evolve without first the platform provide such an 
enhancement (timestamps with deltas would do it).

For now, you should avoid performing resource modifying operations in reaction 
to our deltas during post-change.
